title: TownHall
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Mexican, Asian, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A fast-casual, fresh and healthy take on a neighborhood dining and drinking destination. TownHall features vegan night on Mondays, and marks the gluten free (gf) and vegetarian (v) items on its daily menus. Sample vegan choices such as seared tofu and black beans tacos or burritos, seared tofu and veggies over organic brown rice bowl, and a variety of salads. Sources non-gmo ingredients. Cafe and bar seating areas.
